success.title: Message sent successfully!
success.text: Thank you very much for contacting me, soon I will be communicating with you

error.title: Something went wrong
error.text: Something went wrong, please contact me through one of my other social networks. Thank you very much!

About.title: About me..
About.first: HelloðŸ‘‹, my name is Juan Martin. Full Stack Web Developer. Passionate about web development and mobile applications, creating pleasant and fully functional visual interfaces for the user.
About.second: I am passionate about learning, I believe that every day gives you the opportunity to learn something new and this is one of the reasons why I love this profession.
About.three: I consider myself a very committed person, with initiative and very curious. I like to work in a team, I believe a lot in collaborative learning. I like to solve problems of all kinds, and what I like most about this profession is that every day is a new challenge, every day a new 'obstacle' arises, so to speak, that shapes us and makes us grow day by day as better people, and also as better developers.
